page.title: 18Games Children Play
page.content: Some children bring tennis balls to school and play catch or piggy in the middle.Sometimes we get skipping ropes out and have races.Sometimes we play tag on lines or just tag.In tag one person is 'on it'.That person has to chase after other people the first person that they touch is then 'on it' and so on.Tag on lines is is the same sort of game but it is made harder because you have to stay on the lines.If you come off the lines then you are 'on it'.When I am at home I play on two oil drums which we found in the river.We did put a plank across them but it broke while we were rocking on it.We also play cricket and rounders.If it is raining we play games on our computer.Or we play monopoly and other board games.Or I play marbles or cards.
